table.name: calendarchanges
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: calendarinstances
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: calendars
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: calendarsubscriptions
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: version_ver
table.description: History of all version upgrades applied to this database

table.name: person_per
table.description: This contains the main person data, including person names, person addresses, person phone numbers, and foreign keys to the family table

column.name: per_confirm_report
column.description: For the confirm report of all users

table.name: person_custom
table.description: Person custom fields

table.name: person_custom_master
table.description: This contains definitions for the custom person fields

table.name: family_fam
table.description: This contains the main family data, including family name, family addresses, and family phone numbers

column.name: fam_confirm_report
column.description: For the confirm report of all families

table.name: note_nte
table.description: Contains all person and family notes, including the date, time, and person who entered the note

table.name: config_cfg
table.description: This table contains all non-default configuration parameter names and values

table.name: group_grp
table.description: This contains the name and description for each group, as well as foreign keys to the list of group roles

column.name: grp_Type
column.description: The group type. This is defined in list_lst.OptionId where lst_ID=3

column.name: grp_RoleListID
column.description: The lst_ID containing the names of the roles for this group

column.name: grp_DefaultRole
column.description: The ID of the default role in this group's RoleList

column.name: grp_include_email_export
column.description: Should members of this group be included in MailChimp Export

table.name: groupmembers
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: groupprop_master
table.description: This contains definitions for the group-specific fields

table.name: person2group2role_p2g2r
table.description: This table stores the information of which people are in which groups, and what group role each person holds in that group

table.name: autopayment_aut
table.description: This contains information for automatic electronic donations or payments for events

table.name: canvassdata_can
table.description: this contains information about the results of canvassing families

table.name: deposit_dep
table.description: This records deposits / payments

table.name: donationfund_fun
table.description: This contains the defined donation funds

table.name: event_attend
table.description: this indicates which people attended which events

table.name: events_event
table.description: This contains events

column.name: event_creator_user_id
column.description: For resource slot : the owner is the creator

table.name: pledge_plg
table.description: This contains all payment/pledge information

table.name: list_lst
table.description: This table stores the options for most of the drop down lists in EcclesiaCRM, including person classifications, family roles, group types, group roles, group-specific property types, and custom field value lists.

column.name: lst_ID
column.description: The ID of the list. Since this is a composite primary key, there may be multiple List IDs

column.name: lst_OptionID
column.description: The ID of the option in this list. ***List ID + List Option ID must be unique***

column.name: lst_OptionSequence
column.description: The order in which to display items in this list

column.name: lst_OptionName
column.description: The actual value for this list option

table.name: locks
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: user_usr
table.description: This contains the login information and specific settings for each EcclesiaCRM user

column.name: usr_TwoFaRescueDateTime
column.description: Only 60 seconds to validate the rescue password

column.name: vol_color
column.sqlType: enum('bg-blue text-white','bg-indigo text-white','bg-navy text-white','bg-maroon text-white','bg-brown text-white','bg-purple text-white','bg-pink text-white','bg-magenta text-white','bg-red text-white','bg-orange text-white','bg-yellow text-white','bg-lime text-white','bg-green text-white','bg-teal text-white','bg-cyan text-white','bg-black text-white','bg-gray text-white','bg-white text-dark','bg-transparent text-dark')

column.name: vol_icon
column.sqlType: enum('fas fa-layer-group','fas fa-users','fas fa-desktop','fas fa-file','fas fa-comment','fas fa-music','fas fa-photo-video','fas fa-envelope','fas fa-headset', 'fas fa-book-reader')

table.name: queryparameters_qrp
table.description: defines the parameters for each query

table.name: kioskdevice_kdev
table.description: This contains a list of all (un)registered kiosk devices

column.name: kdev_GUIDHash
column.description: SHA256 Hash of the GUID stored in the kiosk's cookie

column.name: kdev_lastHeartbeat
column.description: Last time the kiosk sent a heartbeat

column.name: kdev_Accepted
column.description: Has the admin accepted the kiosk after initial registration?

column.name: kdev_PendingCommands
column.description: Commands waiting to be sent to the kiosk

column.name: kasm_EventId
column.description: Optional. If the current role is for event check-in, populate this value

table.name: schedulingobjects
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: principals
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: propertystorage
table.description: Calendar management

table.name: propertytype_prt
table.description: This contains all the defined property types

table.name: person2volunteeropp_p2vo
table.description: This table indicates which people are tied to which volunteer opportunities

column.name: plgn_Category
column.description: For the left side menu bar

column.name: plgn_UserRole_Dashboard_Availability
column.description: role choice (none/user/admin) available for dashboard plugins only

column.name: plgn_securities
column.description: See for this point EcclesiaCRM/User.php model class in : SecurityOptions

column.name: plgn_default_color
column.sqlType: enum('bg-gradient-blue text-white', 'bg-gradient-indigo text-white', 'bg-gradient-navy text-white', 'bg-gradient-maroon text-white', 'bg-gradient-purple text-white', 'bg-gradient-pink text-white', 'bg-gradient-red text-white', 'bg-gradient-orange text-black', 'bg-gradient-yellow text-black', 'bg-gradient-lime text-black', 'bg-gradient-green text-black', 'bg-gradient-teal text-black', 'bg-gradient-cyan text-black', 'bg-gradient-gray text-white')

column.name: plgn_prefix
column.description: prefix of the database tables, to avoid conflicts

column.name: plgn_bm_grp_sec
column.description: In lower case : usr_AddRecords, usr_EditRecords, usr_DeleteRecords, usr_ShowCart, usr_ShowMap, usr_EDrive, usr_MenuOptions, usr_ManageGroups, usr_ManageCalendarResources, usr_HtmlSourceEditor, usr_Finance, usr_Notes, usr_EditSelf, usr_Canvasser, usr_Admin, usr_showMenuQuery, usr_CanSendEmail, usr_ExportCSV, usr_CreateDirectory, usr_ExportSundaySchoolPDF, usr_ExportSundaySchoolCSV, usr_MainDashboard, usr_SeePrivacyData, usr_MailChimp, usr_GDRP_DPO, usr_PastoralCare

column.name: plgn_mb_parent_ID
column.description: in the case of a link : the parent is plgn_mb_ID

column.name: plgn_usr_rl_role
column.description: user role : can be the thee enum parts

column.name: plgn_usr_rl_visible
column.description: visible on dashboard (only for dashboard plugins)

column.name: plgn_usr_rl_color
column.sqlType: enum('bg-gradient-blue text-white', 'bg-gradient-indigo text-white', 'bg-gradient-navy text-white', 'bg-gradient-maroon text-white', 'bg-gradient-purple text-white', 'bg-gradient-pink text-white', 'bg-gradient-red text-white', 'bg-gradient-orange text-black', 'bg-gradient-yellow text-black', 'bg-gradient-lime text-black', 'bg-gradient-green text-black', 'bg-gradient-teal text-black', 'bg-gradient-cyan text-black', 'bg-gradient-gray text-white')

column.name: plgn_collapsed
column.description: the plugin is collapse on the dashboard by the default no
